comments.body: The `try...catch` here is more for flavor and consistency - since @cloud-fan suggested that `StagingTableCatalog#stageReplace` should be able to throw `NoSuchTableException`, which could theoretically happen if the table is dropped between the above `tableExists` call and `catalog.stageReplace` calls. This ensures that the same type of exception is thrown from the code path for the same kind of illegal state.
